titles.title: Thanking and promoting the professions of perinatal nurses by encouraging participation in "National Perinatal Nurses Week".
Thanking and promoting the professions of perinatal nurses by encouraging participation in "National Perinatal Nurses Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses gratitude to perinatal nurses and encourages participation in National Perinatal Nurses Week.
